| HistoryText             = The [[Rising Sons (Earth-616)|Rising Sons]] are a mercenary team based on the island nation of [[Madripoor]]. They are a team of super-powered teenagers from various mystical, mechanical, and mutagenic backgrounds. 
  
They battled the mercenary known as [[Paladin (Earth-616)|Paladin]] once and defeated him when he tried to retrieve a sword for [[Adrienne Frost (Earth-616)|Adrienne Frost]], sister of [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]]. 

They hired to protect to existing holder of the sword. Paladin later returned, working with another teenage group [[Generation X (Earth-616)|Generation X]]. They fought the Rising Sons and defeated them, retrieving the sword for Paladin.{{r|Generation X Vol 1 53|54}} After the events of [[M-day]], some of the mutant members were de-powered,{{r|New Avengers Vol 1 18}} so it is not clear if they still operate as a team.
